multiplechoiceresponse.p: Which of the following increases the probability of failure in a distributed system?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Pick one answer

choicegroup.choice: An increase in the reliability of the storage systems, such as the disks
An increase in the redundancy of the system's components
An increase in the number of system components

div.p: As the number of components in the system increases, so does the probability of the failure of one of those components.
Increasing the reliability of the storage systems and the redundancy of systems components actually decreases the probability of failure in a distributed system.
